SAP Quality Management (QM) with Production Planning (PP) Managing ConsultantJob ID GBS-0791136 Job type Full-time RegularWork country USA Position type ProfessionalWork city - Any Posted 02-Sep-2015Travel Up to 4 days a week (home on weekends-based on project requirements) Job area Consulting & ServicesBusiness group Global Business Services Job category ConsultantBusiness unit ConServ Job role Package Solution Consultant Job role skillset SAP.SCM.QMCommissionable/Sales-Incentive jobs only NoJob descriptionThe SAP Quality Management (QM) Consultant should possess expertise in the area of QM and leverage this knowledge to design and develop client solutions. The candidate will be responsible for assisting clients in documenting requirements, solution definition, implementation, and support of SAP QM component. Candidate should be familiar with various integration points and interface options with SAP as it relates to QM. This individual should demonstrate leadership skills and a track record of managing and mentoring teams as well as managing client relationships.The candidate will have SAP and QM experience within Pharmaceutical and Consumer Package Goods Industries. The candidate should possess knowledge, skills, and abilities in QM business requirements and challenges facing clients in these industries.IBM Global Business Services: Join a Leader. Consult with us.IBM Global Business Services helps top-tier clients solve their most complex business and technical issues. As a Global Business Services (GBS) SAP consultant, the candidate will deliver innovative business consulting, business process design, systems integration, and application design and management to leading commercial and public sector organizations in 17 industries worldwide. With access to resources that only a global leader can provide, as a consultant the candidate will learn valuable skills, gain access to a vast and diverse network of talented professionals, and enjoy unparalleled career, training, and educational opportunities.Visit ibm.com/consulting/careers for more information.Required * At least 5 years experience in Quality Management Process transformation *
